Class ManognaNamburu

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Student
          ManognaNamburu

public class ManognaNamburu
extends Student

In this class, which is derived from the student class, is used to set the factors related to my specific seat. It contains my seat and row number, has an animation, and ends with an interactive dialogue session with the user.

Version:
version 1.0
Author:
Manogna Namburu

Method Detail

act

public void act()
When the picture, sitting down, us is clicked the sitting turns to false and so the standing file takes over The picture would they say the name The circle class would be called Once the circle class runs and the questions run, the picture would sit down again.

Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.Actor

answerQuestion

public void answerQuestion()
This method allows an user interaction to ask questions related AP CSA summer hw. It first asks which were the hard topics. Then it can further explain on that topic if the user wishes to know. To access the extra information, the string AskQuestions method is called. Once the questions are asked and answered, the picture would sit back down.The CanISitDown method would be called.

Specified by:
answerQuestion in class Student

AskQuestion

public java.lang.String AskQuestion(java.lang.String q)
This is a string method that would be called in the previous method. This only runs if the user clicks yes, to know more in dept

CanISitDown

public void CanISitDown()
This is a method that would be called in the answer question method. It allows the program to sit back down.

circleClass

public void circleClass()
This is a method that is called in the act method. It performs an animation that lasts for seven seconds. It first uses math random to move between random digits between 0 and 7.(Creates a zig zag pattern) Then the rest use 2D arrays to move in an organized routine. After its over, it goes back to its seat.

getName

public void getName()
Prints the first and last name to the console
